text.headline: Putin's war on civilians
text.text: Images and videos verified by open-source investigators shed light on the suffering of ordinary Ukrainians

media.caption: Tank filmed running over civilian car

text.headline: A tank was filmed running over a civilian car
text.text: Image shows attack on civilian vehicle by Russian tank

text.headline: Bombing of kindergarten
text.text: Russian forces shell kindergarten in Donetsk

text.headline: In another incident, a school was destroyed by mortar fire
text.text: Russian forces shelled the school several times
